title: Bug problem
body: I was about to head into a game when I was stopped and a error came up that a bug was detected and I a scan would need to occur, while the scan was happening I was given a message saying I was a Leaving abuser and will be placed in a low priority queue for 5 games. I dont agree with this as it was due to a bug that I had to leave and not because I wanted to. Is there anyway of being removed from the leaving queue or do i have to now suffer?
